previous.excerpt:
My only position right now is in $MGNI calls, but some that I am watching are
DKNG, TTD, TSM, AMD, and UHMC.

These are all stocks I'm pretty much waiting for a bear week / month to get a
stake in. I'm especially intrigued in UHMC and DKNG.
previous.title: What are some stocks that are on your watch list, and why don't you have a stake in them yet?

localize.title: 有哪些股票在你的观察名单上，你为什么还没有入股？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我现在唯一的仓位是在$MGNI调用, 但一些，我看是
DKNG、TDD、TSM、AMD和UHMC。

这几只股票我都差不多在等待熊市周/月的到来，以获得一个
的股权。我对UHMC和DKNG特别感兴趣。

localize.title: 有哪些股票在你的觀察名單上，你爲什麼還沒有入股？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我現在唯一的倉位是在$MGNI調用, 但一些，我看是
DKNG、TDD、TSM、AMD和UHMC。

這幾隻股票我都差不多在等待熊市周/月的到來，以獲得一個
的股權。我對UHMC和DKNG特別感興趣。

next.excerpt:
For a reddit group that is supposed to be "stocks" you guys block about half of
the available stock markets discussions and abilities on here. No S P A C's are
allowed, which also includes units and warrants, not to mention any s p a c
mergers. Not being allowed to mention anything from the O T C…
next.title: This reddit is supposed to be for "stocks" ??

localize.title: 这个reddit应该是针对 "股票 "的?
localize.the_new_excerpt:
对于一个应该是 "股票 "的reddit小组，你们屏蔽了大约一半的。
可用的股市讨论和能力在这里。没有S P A C的是
允许的，其中还包括单位和权证，更不用说任何S P A C。
合并。不允许提及任何从O T C... ...

localize.title: 這個reddit應該是針對 "股票 "的?
localize.the_new_excerpt:
對於一個應該是 "股票 "的reddit小組，你們屏蔽了大約一半的。
可用的股市討論和能力在這裏。沒有S P A C的是
允許的，其中還包括單位和權證，更不用說任何S P A C。
合併。不允許提及任何從O T C... ...
